question: Which of the following was the Nawab of Bengal at the time of Battle of Buxar?
explanation: The Battle of Buxar was fought in 1764 between the armies of the British East India Company led by Hector Munro and the combined army of Mir Qasim, the Nawab of Bengal; the Nawab of Awadh; and the Mughal King Shah Alam II.
